subject: Re: 回复：simpson pro pedals not working in f1 2025
description_text:
So if the this game is not listed in the simpson manager, how do I configure it to actually work in the game

Sent from AT&T Yahoo Mail on Android 
 
  On Tue, Jun 3, 2025 at 8:23 AM, support<support@simsonn.com> wrote:   

We will download F1 2025 tomorrow, and our engineers will run compatibility tests.
 
We’ll get back to you as soon as the testing is done.
 
In theory, it should be fully supported, and there shouldn’t be any major issues.
​
---- 回复的原邮件 ----
| 发件人 | General and sales enquiries<service@simsonn.com> |
| 发送日期 | 2025年06月03日 19:07 |
|  收件人 | 技术支持<support@simsonn.com> |
| 主题 | 转发：simpson pro pedals not working in f1 2025 |




 ----------转发的邮件信息----------发件人：Cory Drysdale<theoryofdrysdale@att.net>日期：2025年6月2日 周一 5:26收件人：service@simsonn.com<service@simsonn.com>主题：simpson pro pedals not working in f1 2025

im apparently not having any luck getting these to work in the new f1 2025 game off steam.
f1 2023 they work great.  the simpsonn manager software doesnt list the new game f1 2025 so i cant configure it.  How do i get these to work.  kinda desperate now after forking over a lot of money for the new game.
thanks .cory

conversations.body_text: ID 为 108 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单108  
      主题: 转发：simpson pro pedals not working in f1 2025  
      描述:  
   
 
 
   
 
             ----------转发的邮件信息---------- 
 
 
发件人：Cory Drysdale<theoryofdrysdale@att.net>
 
 
日期：2025年6月2日 周一 5:26
 
 
收件人：service@simsonn.com<service@simsonn.com>
 
 
主题：simpson pro pedals not working in f1 2025
 
 
   
   
 
 
 im apparently not having any luck getting these to work in the new f1 2025 game off steam. 
   
 f1 2023 they work great.  the simpsonn manager software doesnt list the new game f1 2025 so i cant configure it.  How do i get these to work.  kinda desperate now after forking over a lot of money for the new game. 
   
 thanks . 
 cory

I have no idea what your results were.  I inquired as to how or how do I get my simpsons pro pedals to work with f 1 20 25? You were going to download the game and try it. I cannot find my purchase order through Alibaba. They have closed my order out.  I do not know the results if you could.Please tell me how to get them to work.It would be great thank you

Sent from AT&T Yahoo Mail on Android
Hi Cory Drysdale,     We have just completed the download and plan to run the tests tomorrow. Thank you for your patience, and we appreciate your understanding!
